head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEEMAN, JAMES DR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEEMAN, JAMES DR.

block.p: KLEEMAN--James Dr. The Western New England Society and Institute for Psychoanalysis mourn the death of our beloved colleague, teacher and friend Dr. James Kleeman on March 30, 2007. Dr. Kleeman was a faculty member and research consultant for the Psychoanalytic Clinic. Oscar Hills, M.D., President, WNEPS Kay M. Long, Ph.D., President, WNEIP

KLEEMAN--James Dr. The Western New England Society and Institute for Psychoanalysis mourn the death of our beloved colleague, teacher and friend Dr. James Kleeman on March 30, 2007. Dr. Kleeman was a faculty member and research consultant for the Psychoanalytic Clinic. Oscar Hills, M.D., President, WNEPS Kay M. Long, Ph.D., President, WNEIP
